title: Tool Document Schema
description: JSON Schema for tool doc-type frontmatter. Tool documents capture documentation for tools, utilities, and scripts.

title.description: The title of the tool document.

tool_name.description: The name of the tool being documented.

version.description: The version of the tool (semver format).

setup_requirements.description: Requirements needed to set up or install the tool.

promotion_level.description: The promotion level for RAG ranking.

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and searching the document.

usage.description: Brief usage instructions for the tool.
